# CIDetectorSmile

**Global Variable**

An option for whether Core Image will perform additional processing to recognize smiles in detected faces.

## Declaration

```swift
let CIDetectorSmile: String
```

## Constants

- **CIDetectorImageOrientation**: An option for the display orientation of the image whose features you want to detect.
- **CIDetectorEyeBlink**: An option for whether Core Image will perform additional processing to recognize closed eyes in detected faces.
- **CIDetectorFocalLength**: An option identifying the focal length in pixels used in capturing images to be processed by the detector.
- **CIDetectorAspectRatio**: An option specifying the aspect ratio (width divided by height) of rectangles to search for.
- **CIDetectorReturnSubFeatures**: An option specifying whether to return feature information for components of detected features.
